availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Benton post office, Marshall County, KY. A Kentucky-born farmer. Married Margaret A. Clark. She was born in South Carolina.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Benton post office, p. 58.

Find A Grave, Entry for James Emory Ford (1816-1871), Find A Grave Memorial # 26031083, Ford Cemetery, Benton, Marshall County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=ford&GSfn=james&GSbyrel=all&GSdy=1871&GSdyrel=in&GSob=n&GRid=26031083&df=all& (accessed 22 May 2017).
